meanings.definition: damaged or destroyed by an explosion
meanings.sent1: The blasted building stood in ruins after the explosion.
meanings.sent2: The firefighters worked hard to save the blasted house from further damage.
meanings.sent3: I can't believe my blasted phone battery died again!
meanings.sent4: The blasted tree trunk shattered into pieces from the force of the blast.
meanings.sent5: The blasted car was unrecognizable after the explosion.

meanings.definition: used for emphasis or to express annoyance or anger
meanings.sent1: She was blasted tired after a long day at work.
meanings.sent2: Oh, blasted! I forgot my keys inside the house.
meanings.sent3: I missed the blasted bus by just a few seconds!
meanings.sent4: The blasted alarm clock never seems to wake me up on time.
meanings.sent5: I'm so blasted frustrated with this never-ending traffic.

meanings.definition: covered in a layer of sand or soil by the force of an explosion
meanings.sent1: The soldiers emerged from the blasted battlefield covered in sand.
meanings.sent2: The archaeologists uncovered artifacts from the blasted site.
meanings.sent3: The kids had a blast playing in the blasted sand dunes.
meanings.sent4: The garden was transformed into a blasted landscape after the explosion.
meanings.sent5: The construction site was left with blasted equipment buried under the sand.
